job.title: Entry-Level Back-End Software Engineer
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: Awardco is an up-and-coming software company focused on providing better solutions to engage and reward employees. Our technology is changing the landscape of employee recognition and we are looking for individuals that want to be part of this exciting worldwide movement. We promise an exciting atmosphere where hard-working individuals are regularly presented with new challenges and opportunities for growth. As a young company on the rise, Awardco provides its employees with terrific opportunities for advancement.Our development team is very lean. Lean software development (agile development) is an essential methodology for our development processes, and each member of our team is trained in agile software development methods and is capable of leading a team that adheres to these processes.What you will do:The Awardco engineers are responsible for an array of duties, including managing the development of new features, changes to our existing code, and improving overall product performance by optimizing existing workflows and code blocks. We expect our development team to be dynamic, display leadership qualities, bring fresh ideas to improve the product, and be enthusiastic to take on new problems as we continue to expand the recognition and incentive industry.Design and implement new features for our existing web applicationContinue to maintain and iterate on released features by implementing and following key metricsPeer code reviewWhat you will bring:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related technical fieldExperience in software engineering from an internship or equivalentExperience in a general purpose programming language including but not limited to: C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, Go, or PythonInterest and ability to learn other programming languagesExperience working with data structures and algorithmsCurrently located or willing to relocate to Provo/Orem, UT areaAuthorization to legally work in the USWorking proficiency in verbal and written EnglishSalary Range$85,000 - $100,000 based on experienceWhy Awardco?Get in early with Utah's #1 fastest-growing company Great Place to Work certifiedA revolutionary, client-approved productLeadership that listensDiligent and dedicated coworkers that make work not feel like work Career growth and opportunity according to what you want to doCool swag, free snacks, and unlimited PTOAwardco is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.
